Name: Boulevard
Ingredients: 15 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist and Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Express orange zest twist over cocktail and discard. Garnish with maraschino cherry.
Review: A Manhattan-style cocktail dried by dry vermouth and enriched by cognac-orange liqueur.
Nutrition: One serving of Boulevard contains 216 calories
